sqlMap.select:
SELECT ORDER_ID ,TRANS_MER_ID ,TRANS_TER_ID ,CHANNEL_TYPE ,TRANS_AMT ,TRANS_CUR ,TRANS_TIME ,TRANS_STATUS ,TRANS_TYPE ,RES_CODE ,RES_DESC ,TRANS_TRACE_TIME ,SETTLE_DATE ,SETTLE_AMT ,SETTLE_CUR ,SETTLE_CONVER_RATE ,MOBILE ,ID_TYPE ,ID_NO ,USER_NAME ,BIND_NUM ,PAN ,CARD_TYPE ,ISSBANK_ID ,ISSBANK_NAME ,CH_INFO ,ACCOUNT1 ,ACCOUNT2 ,ORG_ORDER_ID ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFY_TIME ,RESERVED ,EXT ,CSN ,TRANS_MER_NAME ,SPID ,TRACK2_DATA ,TRACK3_DATA ,IP ,REFERENCE_NO ,AUTH_NO ,DATE_TRANSACTION ,TIME_TRANSACTION ,TRACKING_NO ,ACCOUNT2_NAME ,BATCH_NO ,EXT1 ,EXT2 ,EXT3 ,CREATE_DATE ,IC_DATA FROM PAY_INFO_1029 WHERE 1=1 AND PAY_INFO_1029.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_ter_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANNEL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#channel_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_AMT) =#trans_amt#
(TRANS_CUR) Like '%'||(#trans_cur:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_STATUS) Like '%'||(#trans_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_CODE) Like '%'||(#res_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_DESC) Like '%'||(#res_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TRACE_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_trace_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_AMT) =#settle_amt#
(SETTLE_CUR) Like '%'||(#settle_cur:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_CONVER_RATE) Like '%'||(#settle_conver_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MOBILE) Like '%'||(#mobile:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ID_TYPE) Like '%'||(#id_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ID_NO) Like '%'||(#id_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(USER_NAME) Like '%'||(#user_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BIND_NUM) Like '%'||(#bind_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAN) Like '%'||(#pan:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_TYPE) Like '%'||(#card_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ISSBANK_ID) Like '%'||(#issbank_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ISSBANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#issbank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CH_INFO) Like '%'||(#ch_info:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT1) Like '%'||(#account1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2) Like '%'||(#account2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_ORDER_ID) =#org_order_id#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MODIFY_TIME) Like '%'||(#modify_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CSN) Like '%'||(#csn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SPID) Like '%'||(#spid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACK2_DATA) Like '%'||(#track2_data:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACK3_DATA) Like '%'||(#track3_data:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(IP) Like '%'||(#ip:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REFERENCE_NO) Like '%'||(#reference_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTH_NO) Like '%'||(#auth_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DATE_TRANSACTION) Like '%'||(#date_transaction:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TIME_TRANSACTION) Like '%'||(#time_transaction:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACKING_NO) Like '%'||(#tracking_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_NAME) Like '%'||(#account2_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_NO) Like '%'||(#batch_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT1) Like '%'||(#ext1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT2) Like '%'||(#ext2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT3) Like '%'||(#ext3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(IC_DATA) Like '%'||(#ic_data:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM PAY_INFO_1029 WHERE 1=1 AND PAY_INFO_1029.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'

(ORG_ORDER_ID) =#org_order_id#
